code: import axios from"axios";export function loadProducts(size,page,sort,order,search){return axios({method:"get",url:"/api/private/products",params:{size:size,page:page,sort:sort,order:order,search:search}}).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(){return false;});}export function createNewProduct(newProduct){return axios({method:"post",url:"/api/private/products",data:newProduct}).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(){return false;});}export function updateProduct(productToEdit){return axios({method:"post",url:"/api/private/products",data:productToEdit}).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(){return false;});}export function deleteProduct(productToDelete){return axios({method:"delete",url:"/api/private/products/"+productToDelete.id}).then(function(){return true;}).catch(function(){return false;});}export function createNewCat(newCat){return axios({method:"post",url:"/api/private/categories",data:newCat}).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(){return false;});}export function loadCategories(){return axios({method:"get",url:"/api/private/categories"}).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(){return false;});}
